question: 述べる
sourceMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an <ja>う</ja> sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>mention</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to mention</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: I have <vocabulary>to mention</vocabulary> this thing... "<reading>NO</reading>," (<ja>の</ja>) you quickly respond. I don't want you mentioning that here and now.
